scripts.build: boot build && aws cloudformation package --template-file build.yml --output-template-file <%= outputTemplate %> --s3-bucket offcourse-bootstrap
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file <%= outputTemplate %> --stack-name <%= service %> --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.remote: aws lambda invoke --function-name $(aws cloudformation describe-stack-resources --stack-name echo | jq '.StackResources | map(select(.ResourceType == "AWS::Lambda::Function"))[0].PhysicalResourceId' | sed -e 's/"//g') --payload file://event.json logs.json
